topics.body:
There's only three states that are still refusing to accept gay marriage:
Louisiana (fuck me), Mississippi and Kansas.

Kansas or Mississippi might be the next to go since Kansas is trying to stop gay marriage by essentially their politicians going "it's not legal" and the legal system going "yes it it"; Mississippi pulled a "indefinitely stayed" move.

Louisiana is just giving the middle finger and trying to keep it in place.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
